welcome_message_body: Welcome to Salamanca, a city known for its stunning architecture, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to immerse yourself in the charm of this beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer. Happy exploring!

restaurants.name: Rustico

restaurants.description: Restaurante Jamz is a cajun and creole restaurant located in Salamanca.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Matacan Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
